title: Part I: Problem solving activities and resources
description: Select all of the following activities you carry out on the Internet when you need to solve technical problems to advance in a programming task:

details.title: Asking questions to other developers
details.description: Select all the websites/platforms that you use for the activity above, who you carry it out with and the time used in that website/platform for that activity

details.title: Share and/or discuss coding items, source code, specifications and/or new ideas
details.description: Select all the websites/platforms that you use for the activity above, who you carry it out with, and the time used in that website/platform for that activity

details.title: Find and assess information on the web to solve problems during a project or task
details.description: Select all the websites/platforms that you use for the activity above and the time used in that website/platform for that activity

details.title: Other
details.description: Please describe the other activity(ies) that you carry out when solving problems during programming task and the main website/platform you use, and the time used in that website/platform for that activity

title: Part II: Staying up to date activities and resources
description: Select all of the following activities you carry out on the Internet when you want to stay up to date with the latest trends in the software industry

details.title: Track changes in ongoing open source projects
details.description: Select all the websites/platforms that you use for the activity above, who the projects belong to, and the time used in that website/platform for that activity
